data.title: Guide to the Sierra Club National Legislative Office Records, 1960
data.text:
SERIES 1: OPERATIONAL AND FINANCIAL RECORDS, 1967-1986.

Scope and Content Note

Divided into three subseries: Administrative Files, Papers of the National Legislative Office Directors, and Papers of Legislative Representatives.

The first subseries is arranged alphabetically. The second subseries is arranged chronologically by term of director, and then alphabetically. The last subseries is arranged alphabetically by name of representative.

Cartons 161-162 contain a supplement to the David Gardiner file in Subseries 1.3.

Mission of the Washington [D.C.] Office 1977-78
